description: x402 micropayment-enabled API gateway providing 69 financial data endpoints (stocks, crypto, forex, SEC filings, technical indicators, analyst ratings, news, sanctions screening) with USDC payments on Base network
rules: All endpoints require x402 micropayments in USDC on Base network
Payment amounts are in USDC with 6 decimal places (e.g., 5000 = $0.005)
The MCP server provides tool-based access to all endpoints
